name: corer
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a device for removing the core (= the central part) from something such as a piece of fruit or a vegetable: An apple corer can be used to make a clean and perfect circle in a pumpkin. This corer is made from high-quality stainless steel and it removes cores easily. Related word
core verb
More examplesFewer examplesHold the onion upright and remove the central part with an apple corer. To prepare the apples, remove the apple core with a corer, peel each apple and cut into quarters.With an apple corer or small knife, cut out the centre of the potato.Cut the tops off of the jalapeno peppers and core them using a knife or pepper corer. Have you tried this pineapple corer?
